bibl.title: Subscriptions and Signatures in the Papyri from the Judaean Desert: the χειροχρήστης.
bibl.note: The χειροχρήστης is the one who writes the subscription for those who are legally competent to do so, but who happen to be illiterate, when a subscription and / or a signature in their own hand is required to render a document valid.
bibl.seg: COTTON Hannah M., Subscriptions and Signatures in the Papyri from the Judaean Desert: the χειροχρήστης.

The χειροχρήστης is the one who writes the subscription for those who are legally competent to do so, but who happen to be illiterate, when a subscription and / or a signature in their own hand is required to render a document valid.
